mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_CATEGORY AS category, NOTICE_DATE AS date FROM TBL_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_CONTENT AS content, NOTICE_CATEGORY AS category, NOTICE_DATE AS date FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{title}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{content}, NOTICE_CATEGORY = #{category} WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE (NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_DATE, USER_TYPE) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, NOW(), COALESCE(#{userType}, 'ADMIN'))
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_CATEGORY AS category, NOTICE_DATE AS date FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
